segments.text: I'm peeking into the kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the sink edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her foot in the growing puddle, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, a boy's climbing a stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading outâ€”it's tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm up, begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring behind the mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a neat little garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary day hides so much potential excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
